documents.document: Shuttle bus unreliable ( very selfish driver ) Hotel ok for a one night stopover.We did not book our room we just turned up and requested two rooms for 4 people.We were charged a total of $190 for each room.this seems a bit over the top but paid it as we were all tired.Be careful when using the courtesy shuttle bus to restaurants ect.The driver we got was very selfish, let us down badly after promising to collect us from a restaurant that he recommended only failing to do so after us making two calls to the hotel.After waiting over an hour we got a taxi which cost us $16:00
